entry.em: ..EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THURSDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 107 THIS AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 107 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 106 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
